Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away M distance from Starmie.

Attacks.Name: Swift
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight and cover. If a wild is rolled, this attack deals 1 additional damage.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is lifted and placed within range 2 of their current position and gains the Confused special condition.

Attacks.Name: Rapid Spin
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Starmie may make an immediate move action. During this move, it can move through characters without penalty. If a wild is rolled, remove all special conditions from Starmie.

Superpowers.Name: Aqua Tactics (Affiliation: Misty's Team)
Superpowers.Effect: Friendly characters with the Water type add 1 die to their defense rolls and gain 1 power at the start of their activation.

Superpowers.Name: Natural Cure
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of this character's activation, remove all special conditions from it and gain 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Analytic
Superpowers.Effect: If this character attacks after all other characters have activated this round, add 1 die to the attack roll.

Attacks.Name: Power Gem
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores defense dice granted by the target's superpowers. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Recover
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from this character. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Cosmic Power
Superpowers.Effect: Add 2 dice to Starmie's defense rolls until the start of its next activation. This superpower can be used only once per turn.
